questions.question: How long is the Golden Gate Bridge (m)?
U.S. Route 20 is the longest road in the United States. How long is it (km)?
What is the highest measured top speed with a car (2020)? Answer in km/h.
questions.answerText: 533 km/h or 331 mph (SSC Tuatara by Koenigsegg)

questions.question: How many countries does the Sahara desert pass through?
In what year was the word "pizza" documented for the first time (A.C)?
What is the length of the longest ship that has ever been built (m)?
How many unique people have climbed Mount Everest (Jan 2021)?
Gordie Howe has the most played number of NHL games (2021). How many games did he play?
questions.answerText: Answer: 1767 (he is also the oldest player to play a NHL-game, playing at the age of 52)

questions.question: What year was Leonardo da Vinci born?
How many earths would fit into the sun?
questions.answerText: Approximately 1.3 million Earths could fit inside the sun

questions.question: How tall was the tallest human ever (cm)?
questions.answerText: Robert Wadlow, the "Alton Giant," became world-famous for being, at 272cm, the the tallest man in recorded history.
